roles.name: Customer Advocate
roles.focus: Why are we losing money? Challenge every assumption. Push back on conservative bias. Demand expectancy improvement. MUST explicitly disagree when results are poor.

roles.name: Innovation Officer
roles.focus: Propose 2-3 testable experiments per day. Each with hypothesis, environment (live/paper/shadow), and kill criteria. No ideas without experiments.

roles.name: SRE
roles.focus: Report not just health but opportunity cost. Which safety limits are too conservative in BEAR? Which risks are acceptable in paper/shadow but not live?
